CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Bistro relative to The Rusty Kettle?
SRP.A: Stellar Bistro is {below} The Rusty Kettle in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Cozy Nook relative to The Rusty Kettle?
SRP.A: The Cozy Nook is {below} The Rusty Kettle in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Emerald Diner relative to Stellar Bistro?
SRP.A: Emerald Diner is {below} Stellar Bistro in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Cozy Nook}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Plate}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Emerald Diner's maximum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Emerald Diner's maximum Customer Traffic is in {1973}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Plate's maximum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Plate's maximum Customer Traffic is in {1975}.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1981, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1976 and 1979?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1977 and 1981 was {larger} than between 1976 and 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1979, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1977 and 1979 was {smaller} than between 1974 and 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1983, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1977 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1977 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1977 and 1980.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1978, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1979 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1973 and 1978 was {smaller} than between 1979 and 1982.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {The Cozy Nook} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Emerald Diner and The Rusty Kettle first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Emerald Diner and The Rusty Kettle did not exchange leading positions.
